verses.verse: Then Jonah <WH3124> prayed <WH6419> to Yahweh, <WH3068> his God, <WH430> out of the fish <WH1710>'s belly. <WH4578>

He said, <WH559> "I called <WH7121> because of my affliction <WH6869> to Yahweh. <WH3068> He answered <WH6030> me. <WH990> Out of the belly of Sheol <WH7585> I cried. <WH7768> You heard <WH8085> my voice. <WH6963>

For you threw <WH7993> me into the depths, <WH4688> in the heart <WH3824> of the seas. <WH3220> The flood <WH5104> was all around <WH5437> me. <WH1530> All your waves and your billows <WH4867> passed over me. <WH5674>
I said, <WH559> <WH1644> 'I have been banished from your sight; <WH5869> yet I will look <WH5027> again <WH3254> toward your holy <WH6944> temple. <WH1964>'
The waters <WH4325> surrounded <WH661> me, <WH5315> even to the soul. The deep <WH8415> was around <WH5437> me. <WH5488> The weeds were wrapped around <WH2280> my head. <WH7218>

I went down <WH3381> to the bottoms <WH7095> of the mountains. <WH2022> The earth <WH776> barred <WH1280> me in forever: <WH5769> yet have you brought up <WH5927> my life <WH2416> from the pit, <WH7845> Yahweh <WH3068> my God. <WH430>
"When my soul <WH5315> fainted <WH5848> within me, <WH2142> I remembered Yahweh. <WH3068> My prayer <WH8605> came in <WH935> to you, <WH6944> into your holy temple. <WH1964>
Those who regard <WH8104> lying <WH7723> vanities <WH1892> forsake <WH5800> their own mercy. <WH2617>
But I will sacrifice <WH2076> to you with the voice <WH6963> of thanksgiving. <WH8426> I will pay <WH7999> that which I have vowed. <WH5087> Salvation <WH3444> belongs to Yahweh. <WH3068>"
Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to the fish, <WH1709> and it vomited out <WH6958> <WH3124> on the dry land. <WH3004>
